summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RPA Simplificado feature for TVDEFleet. All 26 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI fully functional with all 5 suppliers displayed, upload modal working, histórico showing import records, and exportar tab showing all 3 export options.

issues: Console warning: 'Encountered two children with the same key' - duplicate key issue with parceiro ID c693c9ec-ddd5-400c-b79d-61b651e7b3fd (pre-existing issue from iteration 15)

GET /api/rpa/fornecedores.description: Lists 5 suppliers: combustivel_prio, eletrico_prio, gps_verizon, gps_cartrack, outro

GET /api/rpa/fornecedores/{id}.description: Returns supplier details by ID, 404 for invalid ID

POST /api/rpa/upload/{fornecedor_id}.description: Uploads and processes CSV files for all 5 suppliers (requires auth + parceiro_id)

GET /api/rpa/exportar/relatorios-semanai.description: Exports weekly reports CSV (returns 404 if no data)

GET /api/rpa/exportar/recibos.description: Exports receipts CSV (returns 404 if no data)

GET /api/rpa/exportar/despesas.description: Exports expenses CSV (returns 404 if no data)

historico_tab.description: Shows import history table with Date, Fornecedor, Ficheiro, Registos, Erros, Status columns

critical_code_review_comments: Upload endpoint requires parceiro_id parameter for admin users - this is correct behavior as admin needs to specify which partner the import belongs to
seed_data_creation: Created test CSV imports for all 5 suppliers during backend testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: RPA Simplificado feature is fully functional. Backend tests in /app/tests/test_rpa_simplificado.py cover all endpoints. Test data was created for parceiro_id ab2a25aa-4f70-4c7b-835d-9204b0cd0d7e (Santos & Filhos Lda). Export endpoints return 404 when no data exists (expected behavior). The API constant in frontend already includes '/api', so calls should be ${API}/rpa/... not ${API}/api/rpa/...
